namespace blobfolio\phone\data;

class dataMZ extends data {

	const CODE = 'MZ';

	const PREFIX = 258;

	const REGION = 'Africa';

	const PATTERNS = array(
		'(?:2|8\d)\d{7}',
	);

	const TYPES = array(
		'2(?:[1346]\d|5[0-2]|[78][12]|93)\d{5}'=>array(
			'fixed',
		),
		'8[2-7]\d{7}'=>array(
			'mobile',
		),
		'800\d{6}'=>array(
			'toll_free',
		),
	);

	const FORMATS = array(
		'(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3,4})'=>'$1 $2 $3',
		'(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3',
	);

}
